Name: Merge Me!
About the game: Merge Me! is a simple but addictive idle merge game. Combine same monsters to get their improved versions. Sell them to get resources that you can use to buy various upgrades. Buy more slots, upgrade monsters reward, unlock an auto merge or buy it all at once... Feel free to choose your own playthrough! Use monsters to farm gold coins to buy powerful upgrades. Unlock mighty prestige relics to reset all progress and significantly boost your profit. Complete the game and conquer the global leaderboard taking the first place! Benefits: Addictive idle merge gameplay with possibility to complete the game Almost one hundred monsters to combine Deep upgrades system with various currencies and shops Prestige system to reset your progress in exchange for a powerful income boost No boring exponential difficulty growth. Fair rewards and fair prices Detailed statistics to track your progress 50 Steam achievements to collect and global ranking system Fancy pixel graphics Toggleable animated backgrounds and screen effects Calm and relaxing ambient music with tracks switch option Just try Merge Me! and have fun!
